name: @braintrust/lingua
description: TypeScript bindings for Lingua - Universal message format for LLM APIs

scripts.build:wasm: cd ../.. && cargo build --lib --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --profile wasm && wasm-bindgen target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/wasm/lingua.wasm --out-dir bindings/typescript/wasm --typescript --target nodejs && (command -v wasm-opt >/dev/null 2>&1 && wasm-opt -Oz bindings/typescript/wasm/lingua_bg.wasm -o bindings/typescript/wasm/lingua_bg.wasm || echo 'wasm-opt not found, skipping optimization')
scripts.build:wasm:web: cd ../.. && cargo build --lib --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --profile wasm && wasm-bindgen target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/wasm/lingua.wasm --out-dir bindings/typescript/wasm-web --typescript --target web && (command -v wasm-opt >/dev/null 2>&1 && wasm-opt -Oz bindings/typescript/wasm-web/lingua_bg.wasm -o bindings/typescript/wasm-web/lingua_bg.wasm || echo 'wasm-opt not found, skipping optimization')
